Class ec.ifc.app.ECStaticTextCGItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ContainerView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.app.ECControlGroupItem
                           |
                           +----ec.ifc.app.ECStaticTextCGItem
public class ECStaticTextCGItem
extends ECControlGroupItem
This is a specialized ECControlGroupItem subclass that just displays a static text string. The justification and margin of the text field containing the string can be specified.

DEFAULT_MARGIN
myTextField
the text field displaying the label
myTextMargin
the margin at left and right of the text field that we won't overrun

ECStaticTextCGItem(String)
Returns a new ECStaticTextCGItem with the given string, left justification, a default font, and a height of 0.
ECStaticTextCGItem(String, int, Font, int)
Returns a new ECStaticTextCGItem with the given string, justification, font, and height.

getFont()
Returns the font used to draw the displayed text
getJustification()
Returns the justification used for the displayed text.
getLabel()
Overridden to return null since this item doesn't have a separate label
getTextMargin()
The space to the left and right of the displayed text
layoutContents(int)
Overridden to reposition the text by calling positionText.
setFont(Font)
Sets the font used to draw the displayed text
setJustification(int)
Sets the justification used for the displayed text.
setLabel(String)
Sets the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item.
setTextMargin(int)
Sets the text margin.

DEFAULT_MARGIN 
  protected final static int DEFAULT_MARGIN
myTextField 
  protected TextField myTextField
the text field displaying the label
myTextMargin 
  protected int myTextMargin
the margin at left and right of the text field that we won't overrun

ECStaticTextCGItem 
  public ECStaticTextCGItem(String text)
Returns a new ECStaticTextCGItem with the given string, left justification, a default font, and a height of 0. You can change the height of an ECControlGroupItem before adding it to an ECControlGroup, but not afterwards.
ECStaticTextCGItem 
  public ECStaticTextCGItem(String text,
                            int justification,
                            Font font,
                            int height)
Returns a new ECStaticTextCGItem with the given string, justification, font, and height. The justification must be one of Graphics.LEFT_JUSTIFIED, Graphics.RIGHT_JUSTIFIED, or Graphics.CENTERED

getFont 
  public Font getFont()
Returns the font used to draw the displayed text
getJustification 
  public int getJustification()
Returns the justification used for the displayed text. This is one of Graphics.LEFT_JUSTIFIED, Graphics.RIGHT_JUSTIFIED, or Graphics.CENTERED
getLabel 
  public String getLabel()
Overridden to return null since this item doesn't have a separate label
Overrides:
getLabel in class ECControlGroupItem
getTextMargin 
  public int getTextMargin()
The space to the left and right of the displayed text
layoutContents 
  public void layoutContents(int labelWidth)
Overridden to reposition the text by calling positionText.
Overrides:
layoutContents in class ECControlGroupItem
setFont 
  public void setFont(Font newFont)
Sets the font used to draw the displayed text
setJustification 
  public void setJustification(int newJustification)
Sets the justification used for the displayed text.
See Also:
getJustification
setLabel 
  public void setLabel(String newLabel)
Sets the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item. Does nothing here, because ECStaticTextCGItems don't have separate labels.
